models.name: economic_political_discussion_board_channels
models.description: Represents the main channels or sections of the discussion board where users can engage in conversations. Each channel has a unique identifier, name, and description. Channels are organized into sections and can contain multiple categories. This table serves as the top-level organizational structure for the discussion board.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: The name of the channel.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: A brief description of the channel's purpose and content.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the channel was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the channel was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the channel was deleted, if applicable.

models.name: economic_political_discussion_board_sections
models.description: Represents the sections within a channel of the discussion board. Each section has a unique identifier, name, and description. Sections are used to further organize content within a channel and can contain multiple categories. This table provides a mid-level organizational structure for the discussion board.

foreignFields.name: economic_political_discussion_board_channel_id
foreignFields.description: The ID of the channel that this section belongs to. {@link economic_political_discussion_board_channels.id}

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: The name of the section.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: A brief description of the section's purpose and content.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the section was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the section was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the section was deleted, if applicable.

models.name: economic_political_discussion_board_categories
models.description: Represents the categories within a section of the discussion board. Each category has a unique identifier, name, and description. Categories are used to further organize content within a section and can contain multiple discussion threads. This table provides a detailed organizational structure for the discussion board.

foreignFields.name: economic_political_discussion_board_section_id
foreignFields.description: The ID of the section that this category belongs to. {@link economic_political_discussion_board_sections.id}

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: The name of the category.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: A brief description of the category's purpose and content.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the category was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the category was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the category was deleted, if applicable.

models.name: economic_political_discussion_board_guest
models.description: Represents unauthenticated users who can only view public content.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest record was last updated.

models.name: economic_political_discussion_board_member
models.description: Represents authenticated users who can create and comment on discussion threads.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Email address of the member.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for authentication.

plainFields.name: username
plainFields.description: Username of the member.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the member record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the member record was last updated.

models.name: economic_political_discussion_board_moderator
models.description: Represents users with elevated permissions who can manage content and enforce community guidelines.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Email address of the moderator.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for authentication.

plainFields.name: username
plainFields.description: Username of the moderator.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the moderator record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the moderator record was last updated.

models.name: economic_political_discussion_board_admin
models.description: Represents system administrators with full access to manage users, content, and system settings.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Email address of the admin.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for authentication.

plainFields.name: username
plainFields.description: Username of the admin.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the admin record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the admin record was last updated.

models.name: economic_political_discussion_board_threads
models.description: Represents a discussion thread in the economic/political discussion board. This table captures the essential information for a thread, including its title, content, and status. It serves as the primary entity for user interactions and content management.

foreignFields.name: economic_political_discussion_board_channel_id
foreignFields.description: The channel to which this thread belongs. {@link economic_political_discussion_board_channels.id}

foreignFields.name: economic_political_discussion_board_category_id
foreignFields.description: The category to which this thread belongs. {@link economic_political_discussion_board_categories.id}

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: The title of the thread.

plainFields.name: content
plainFields.description: The content of the thread.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: The status of the thread (e.g., open, closed, locked).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the thread was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the thread was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the thread was deleted (soft delete).

models.name: economic_political_discussion_board_thread_snapshots
models.description: Represents a snapshot of a discussion thread at a specific point in time. This table captures the historical states of threads, allowing for audit trails and change tracking. It is used for historical data access and audit trail queries.

foreignFields.name: economic_political_discussion_board_thread_id
foreignFields.description: The thread to which this snapshot belongs. {@link economic_political_discussion_board_threads.id}

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: The title of the thread at the time of the snapshot.

plainFields.name: content
plainFields.description: The content of the thread at the time of the snapshot.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: The status of the thread at the time of the snapshot.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the snapshot was created.

models.name: economic_political_discussion_board_comments
models.description: Represents user comments on discussion threads in the economic/political discussion board. Each comment is associated with a specific thread and member, and maintains a complete history of changes through related snapshots.

foreignFields.name: economic_political_discussion_board_thread_id
foreignFields.description: The thread this comment belongs to. {@link economic_political_discussion_board_threads.id}.

foreignFields.name: economic_political_discussion_board_member_id
foreignFields.description: The member who created this comment. {@link economic_political_discussion_board_member.id}.

plainFields.name: content
plainFields.description: The text content of the comment.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: When the comment was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: When the comment was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: When the comment was deleted (soft delete).

models.name: economic_political_discussion_board_comment_snapshots
models.description: Historical snapshots of economic_political_discussion_board_comments for audit trails and change tracking. Each snapshot captures the complete state of a comment at a specific point in time.

foreignFields.name: economic_political_discussion_board_comment_id
foreignFields.description: The comment this snapshot belongs to. {@link economic_political_discussion_board_comments.id}.

plainFields.name: content
plainFields.description: The text content of the comment at this snapshot.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: When this snapshot was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: When the comment was last updated at this snapshot.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: When the comment was deleted at this snapshot (soft delete).

models.name: economic_political_discussion_board_reports
models.description: Table for storing reports of inappropriate content in the economic/political discussion board. This table captures user reports of content violations, including the reason for reporting and the status of the report. It establishes relationships with user tables and content tables to maintain a complete record of reported content.

foreignFields.name: economic_political_discussion_board_member_id
foreignFields.description: The member who submitted the report. {@link economic_political_discussion_board_member.id}

plainFields.name: reason
plainFields.description: The reason for the report.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Additional details about the report.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: The current status of the report (e.g., pending, reviewed, resolved).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the report was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the report was last updated.

models.name: economic_political_discussion_board_moderation_snapshots
models.description: Table for storing snapshots of moderation actions taken on reported content. This table captures the details of moderation actions, including the action taken, the reason, and the moderator who took the action. It establishes relationships with user tables and content tables to maintain a complete audit trail of moderation actions.

foreignFields.name: economic_political_discussion_board_moderator_id
foreignFields.description: The moderator who took the action. {@link economic_political_discussion_board_moderator.id}

plainFields.name: action
plainFields.description: The action taken by the moderator (e.g., delete, warn, ban).

plainFields.name: reason
plainFields.description: The reason for the moderation action.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the moderation action was taken.
